Text:
Anyone managed to get it working? Please post so I know what problems you might be having.. (or praises if you've had no problems)..

Wolfy.
I'll give it a try!  I HATE vodei so if it works there will be a little more love in the world!
Gave it a shot. Set up vpc, win98, and installed vodei. Worked through graphedit on the vpc but when I hit the play button it told me vodei had expired and I need to register.

Yes, very good. It works indeed. This dr_scottie says it doesn't but i guess he slipped something along the way. The instructions are great and work 100%. Too bad the GraphEdit can't read mp3 and encode it. It makes the process sooooo much longer becuase i have to reconvert the new "video-clean" file into MPEG and then reconvert that one into divx. The PCM audio makes the new file twice as big so recompression is really nessesary, unless you want a 1.45 GB divx. 
So this is me praising you Wolf and for those wanting to rid themselves of the vodei go for it. I just have a problem in getting the Virtual Machine running, but that's coolio, i'll work out a solution. Cheers!
looks like something is wrong, my VPC is not working at all, I dont know wether I dont know how to use it or it is curropted
